alert.note: Alert for Claiborne; Hancock (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 25 at 4:22PM CDT until September 25 at 4:45PM CDT by NWS Knoxville
info.description: The National Weather Service in Morristown has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Claiborne County in east Tennessee... Northwestern Hancock County in east Tennessee... Southwestern Lee County in southwestern Virginia... * Until 545 PM EDT. * At 522 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Hutch, or 9 miles east of Middlesboro, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Tazewell, Harrogate, Cumberland Gap, Ewing and Powell River Preserve. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
